attributes.action: Get rid of the petitions site
attributes.background:
The petitions site has always been an ignored 'democratic' tool, where petitions with millions of signatures are shunned out without any consideration from the Government. 
It is insulting to lie to citizens about their ability to influence policy, and this site should therefore be removed.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Shut down the UK Government and Parliament Petitions system
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734870
